identificationModule.briefTitle: Safety,Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetic of KPCXM18 for Injection
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Randomized, Blind, Placebo-controlled,Single Andmultiple Ascending Dose Study to Assess the Safety,Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetic of KPCXM18 for Injection in Healthy Subjects

descriptionModule.briefSummary: to assess the safety,Tolerability, and pharmacokinetic of KPCXM18 for injection in healthy subjects
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: To explore the safety, tolerance and pharmacokinetic of KPCXM18 for injection in healthy subjects by intravenous administration of different doses in single and multiple administration safety, tolerance and pharmacokinetic tests, and to obtain the safe dose range of the test drugs, thus providing dose design basis for phase II clinical trials.

armGroups.label: KPCXM18 for injection
armGroups.description: KPCXM18 ，freeze-dried powder,single and multiple ascending doses, Intravenous route

armGroups.label: Placebo
armGroups.description: Placebo, freeze-dried powder,single and multiple ascending doses, Intravenous route

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal vital signs
primaryOutcomes.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal vital signs
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, an average of 2 week

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal laboratory
primaryOutcomes.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal laboratory
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, an average of 2 week

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal physical examination
primaryOutcomes.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal physical examination
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, an average of 2 week

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal electrocardiogram
primaryOutcomes.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal electrocardiogram
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, an average of 2 week

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
primaryOutcomes.description: To evaluate the safety KPCXM 18 for Injection with placebo after multiple intravenous dose in healthy Chinese subjects in terms of abnormal adverse events
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, an average of 2 week

secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 7 days

secondaryOutcomes.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetic parameters： AUC0-∞ of KPCXM18 after the first day administer
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 7 days

secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Time Frame: Between Day 1 to 7 days
